title: Teenager killed in Mesa County accidental shooting
content:
CLIFTON, Colo. - A 15-year-old was killed Sunday by an accidental in Mesa County.
The County Sheriff's Office says they don't believe there was any malicious intent behind the shooting that killed Brandon Crawford. He was found dead inside a home in the 3200 block of E Rood Circle, in Clifton, around 3:13 p.m. Sunday.
On Monday, the Mesa County Coroner said Crawford died from a gunshot wound to the chest and ruled the death a homicide.
The person responsible for the shooting is being cooperative with the investigation, deputies say.
